headline.main: BRITISH GET 55-YEAR 2% LOAN; LEND-LEASE DEBTS SETTLED; WORLD TRADE SPUR SOUGHT; AID UP TO CONGRESS Mutual Benefits Cited as Truman and Attlee Announce Agreement CREDIT TO BE SPENT HERE Both Governments Pledge Joint Action to Lower Tariffs and Bolster Employment
